name: 🐀 DE RAT 🐀
description:
Made for Alakajam #7 (here's the entry page)

Dust Exposure Research and Testing

In this game you're a rat trying to escape a stack of testing facilities while battling the dustybois.

A lot of stuff came up during the jam and the game is nowhere near as good as I'd like it to be, but I had fun making it regardless. I also didn't have enough time to work on audio so you'll just have to cope with silence I guess. 🐀

Credits: Programming, Level Design, Art: KP_CFTSZ
Programming, Level Design: UltrasonicAeron
Art, Animation: TheChaseExp

Controls:
Movement: Up, Down, Left, Right
Tail spin: X
Jump: Z or Space

You can also hold X before jumping for a bit of a boost.

REQUIRES JAVA 8 OR HIGHER (wasn't my choice lmao)
